nodes.text: GL-0T15 was a black-plated GL vendor droid owned by the criminal Crimson Dawn group during the reign of the Galactic Empire. It served as the operator for the principal turbolift onboard the First Light, the personal yacht of Crimson Dawn's leader Dryden Vos.

In 10 BBY, the vendor droid spent time on the yacht's viewing platform amongst the guests of a party that Vos was hosting and was present in the room when the criminal Tobias Beckett and his associates Han Solo and Chewbacca arrived. GL-0T15 was equipped with a bank of weapon scanners, including close-range sensor modules in its head that could detect chemical and energy weaponry.

GL-0T15 first appeared in the 2018 Anthology film, Solo: A Star Wars Story, and was first named in the accompanying reference book, Solo: A Star Wars Story The Official Guide, written by Pablo Hidalgo.
